tool_description: Generates executable backup job configurations by combining database connections, schedules, and storage settings with specific backup parameters.

job_name.description: Unique name for the backup job

database_config_id.description: Reference to validated database connection configuration

include_schemas.description: List of specific schemas to backup

exclude_tables.description: List of tables to exclude from backup

verify_backup.description: Whether to verify backup integrity after creation

notification_emails.description: Email addresses for backup status notifications

error_messages: Invalid configuration reference: One or more referenced configurations (database, schedule, storage) do not exist.
Job name conflict: A backup job with this name already exists.
Invalid backup type: Use one of [full, incremental, differential].
Invalid parameter range: parallel_threads must be 1-16, timeout_minutes must be 5-1440.
Schema/table specification error: Specified schemas or tables do not exist in the target database.
Invalid email format: One or more notification email addresses are invalid.
usage: Provide a unique job name and reference IDs for database, schedule, and storage configurations. Specify backup type and optionally configure performance settings, schema filters, and notifications. Returns complete backup job configuration.

job_id.description: Generated unique identifier for the backup job

estimated_duration_minutes.description: Estimated backup duration based on database size and configuration

estimated_backup_size_gb.description: Estimated backup file size in gigabytes

job_configuration_summary.description: Human-readable summary of the backup job configuration

next_execution_time.description: Next scheduled execution time in ISO 8601 format
